timeline.bodyText:
Unlike most of our API docs, this one uses H3s.
For some reason, it's applying the [role="child_attributes"] attribute to
the H3 rather than its associated div/section.
As a workaround, you can create a section block using ==== and apply the attribute to it.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [float]
          
          
            
            [role="child_attributes"]
          
          
            
            === Request Body
          
          
            
            [float]
          
          
            
            === Request Body
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            [role="child_attributes"]
          
          
            
            ====
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,6 +30,7 @@ enable you to _spider out_ from one more vertices of interest. You can exclude
 vertices that have already been returned.
 
 [float]
+[role="child_attributes"]
 === Request Body

timeline.bodyText:
This closes the block section we created in https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/55067/files#r406887032.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ======
          
          
            
            ======
          
          
            
            ====

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -168,6 +180,7 @@ a maximum number of documents per value for that field. For example:
   "max_docs_per_value": 500
 }
 --------------------------------------------------
+======

timeline.bodyText:
We need to include a + so this is nested under the vertices definition.
